Boeing plane crew failures risked engine failure over Auckland, says Accident Investigation Commission https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/boeing-plane-crew-failures-risked-engine-failure-over-auckland-says-accident-investigation-commission/QQA7SZFDOBBXDDFKPVCMMYK3UY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/boeing-plane-crew-failures-risked-engine-failure-over-auckland-says-accident-investigation-commission/QQA7SZFDOBBXDDFKPVCMMYK3UY/ Raphael FranksThe crew forgot to properly activate a key fuel pump. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:56:17 +0000 A Boeing 737 risked its engines failing above Auckland in June 2022 and crashing. The Transport Accident Investigation Commission has found the crew at fault.
Napier’s 150th: A century and a half marked in Art Deco City sun https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napiers-150th-a- century-and-a-half-marked-in-art-deco-city-sun/VBVHI4YIPVCEHIUPER6OBYOP3I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napiers-150th-a- century-and-a-half-marked-in-art-deco-city-sun/VBVHI4YIPVCEHIUPER6OBYOP3I/ Doug LaingFree coffee and ice cream as Napier marks 150 years.Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:48:16 +0000 A typically sunny Napier November day, with centennial booklets shielding punters from the sun in the Thursday-morning commemoration of the 150 years since Napier became a borough. Photo / Doug Laing.
